summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 JEEP CHEROKEE. WHILE DRIVING VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE VEHICLE JERKED AND DECELERATED. THE FAILURE RECURRED SEVERAL OTHER TIMES. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE LOCAL DEALER (WHITTEN BROTHERS OF ASHLAND LOCATED AT 11409 WASHINGTON HWY, ASHLAND, VA 23005; (888) 459-1066), BUT NO FAILURES WERE FOUND WITH THE VEHICLE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 800-247-9753 AND ADVISED THE CONTACT TO TAKE THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER. CASE NUMBER: 31826079 WAS PROVIDED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 30,700. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE.
